description: Axolot Solutions Holding AB engages in the provision of environmental technology solutions. The company is headquartered in Helsingborg, Skane. The company went IPO on 2018-11-21. The firm develops and sells systems for industrial water treatment. The firm's technology is based on a coaxial electrochemical continuous reactor. The contaminants, such as organic matter, phosphorus and nitrogen compounds, metal ions and suspended solids, among others, are separated from water through the use of electricity. The technology enables breaking oil dispersions, separating valuable components for reuse and toxic contaminants for safe disposal. The firm's offering is directed at such industries as pulp and paper, mining, refining and chemical. The company provides a complete solution, from pre-treatment to polishing and flocculant handling.
naics: Commercial and Service Industry Machinery Manufacturing
naicsNationalIndustry: Other Commercial and Service Industry Machinery Manufacturing
name: Axolot Solutions Holding AB
